name: Performing Arts in Colonial American Newspapers
description: Contains references to music, poetry, dance, and theater found in American newspapers published from 1690 through 1783, including those in French and German. Offers full text citations, indexes of names, genres, subjects, titles, and first-lines of lyrics, a bibliography of issues, and a graphic file of woodcuts.**This resource is only accessible in Bobst Library. To use this resource, stop by the 5th floor Reference Center.
